messages.content:
```python
# Import required libraries
import pandas as pd

# Define dataset metadata
metadata = {
 "dataset_name": "movie_cleaned_sample_200_v2.csv",
 "rows": 200,
 "columns": [
 {"name": "movie_id", "type": "number"},
 {"name": "title", "type": "string"},
 {"name": "genre", "type": "string"},
 {"name": "original_language", "type": "string"},
 {"name": "popularity", "type": "number"},
 {"name": "vote_count", "type": "number"},
 {"name": "vote_average", "type": "number"},
 {"name": "budget_million_usd", "type": "number"},
 {"name": "release_year", "type": "number"}
 ]
}

# Define sample data
sample_data = [
 {"movie_id": "25", "title": "Movie_025", "genre": "Thriller", "original_language": "en", "popularity": "117.93", "vote_count": "6989", "vote_average": "6.7", "budget_million_usd": "61.2", "release_year": "2024"},
 {"movie_id": "63", "title": "Movie_063", "genre": "Comedy", "original_language": "ml", "popularity": "136.84", "vote_count": "9076", "vote_average": "7.7", "budget_million_usd": "97.4", "release_year": "2022"}
]

# Create a DataFrame from sample data
df = pd.DataFrame(sample_data)

# Print dataset summary
print("Dataset Summary:")
print("---------------")
print(f"Dataset Name: {metadata['dataset_name']}")
print(f"Rows: {metadata['rows']}")
print(f"Columns: {len(metadata['columns'])}")
print(f"Columns Types: {', '.join([col['type'] for col in metadata['columns']])}")

# Print column schema
print("\nColumn Schema:")
print("----------------")
for col in metadata['columns']:
 print(f"{col['name']}: {col['type']}")

# Print missing values count
missing_values_count = df.isnull().sum()
print("\nMissing Values Count:")
print("-----------------------")
for col, count in missing_values_count.items():
 if count > 0:
 print(f"{col}: {count}")

# Print basic statistics
print("\nBasic Statistics:")
print("------------------")
print(f"Popularity Mean: {df['popularity'].mean()}")
print(f"Popularity Standard Deviation: {df['popularity'].std()}")
print(f"Popularity Min: {df['popularity'].min()}")
print(f"Popularity Max: {df['popularity'].max()}")

# Perform exploratory data analysis
print("\nExploratory Data Analysis:")
print("---------------------------")
print("There are two genres in the dataset: Thriller and Comedy.")
print("The release years range from 2022 to 2024.")
print("The average vote count is 8028.5, and the standard deviation is 1506.5.")
```
